messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Dome pictures
messages.msgSnippet: ... == You are MORE than welcome, Kelli. Although, I don t know what the more part means. Todd ... You re just jealous because the voices are talking to ME!
messages.messageBody:
At 08:25 AM 10/21/02 -0700, you wrote:

>Thanks Todd, cool!
>Kelli
==
You are MORE than welcome, Kelli. Although, I don't know what the more part
means.<g>

Todd
------
You're just jealous because the voices are talking to ME! <g>
http://rambleman.tripod.com/index.html

Thanks Todd, cool!
Kelli

*might* want to see pictures. If so, you can see them at

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Dome pictures
messages.msgSnippet: ... == You re very welcome. I tend to be a visual learner at times, and seeing pictures is fascinating for me. Glad you enjoyed them :-) Todd ... You re
messages.messageBody:
At 12:34 PM 10/18/02 -0400, you wrote:

>Thanks for sharing!
>melly~
==
You're very welcome. I tend to be a "visual" learner at times, and seeing
pictures is fascinating for me.<g> Glad you enjoyed them :-)

Todd
------
You're just jealous because the voices are talking to ME! <g>
http://rambleman.tripod.com/index.html

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Dome pictures
messages.msgSnippet: Love love LOVE all the pictures Todd!! I want goats now!! ; ) It s funny - I wonder the same things, why folks who don t really know me would want to see
messages.messageBody:
Love love LOVE all the pictures Todd!!
I want goats now!! ; )
It's funny - I wonder the same things, why folks who don't really "know" me
would want to see pictures but I think most people like putting faces with
names and the dome pictures really brought the activity to life for me!
Thanks for sharing!
melly~

----- Original Message -----
From: "Todd M." <Ozarkren@...>
To: <Ramble Readers :;>
Sent: Thursday, October 17, 2002 7:53 PM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Dome pictures
